Trade/Device Name(s): RNA1c Hemoglobin A1c Control for Bayer DCA2000 and DCA2000+ Analyzers
RNA1c Control for Bayer DCA2000 and DCA2000+ Analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RNA1c Hemoglobin A1c Control as an aqueous solution for quality control on Bayer DCA2000 and DCA2000+ Analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to monitor and evaluate the analytical performance of Bayer DCA2000 and DCA2000+ Analyzers that measure HbA1c, providing objective assessment of precision within clinically important range.
